name: Puzzle Cube (itch) (kkekk)
description:
A short game I made over 2 weeks as part our Alternate Reality Game Uni project.

First published at: https://bryanlaisanggmailcom.itch.io/transcend-tom

If you're interested in the ARG scan the QR code at the end of our trailer https://youtu.be/TvYyG1Fsw0A, or on the missing poster file.

Username and Password to paly the game (Or play the ARG and get it the correct way):

User Name: v0xbHypu2ybV 

Password: xkrUL5gdQ46

How To play:

Look at the manual pdf within the folder.

Drag the cube to play difference face with different puzzle.

Get all the puzzle correct the get the code (for the ARG game ending)

The game is suppose to be played only once + short amount of time for development means nothing except the Simon button is randomised
